thread.title: Pregnant Danielle Lloyd puts wedding plans on hold as she reveals she HASN'T told Jamie O'Hara she's expecting
thread.title_full: Pregnant Danielle Lloyd puts wedding plans on hold as she reveals she HASN'T told Jamie O'Hara she's expecting

author: Emmeline Saunders
title: Pregnant Danielle Lloyd puts wedding plans on hold as she reveals she HASN'T told Jamie O'Hara she's expecting
text:
Pregnant Danielle Lloyd puts wedding plans on hold as she reveals she HASN'T told Jamie O'Hara she's expecting The model threw shade at her ex-husband as she opened up about her new relationship Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Danielle Lloyd hasn't yet told her ex Jamie O'Hara that she's pregnant again, as she believes she "doesn't owe him anything" after their split. 
The 33-year-old model, who is now expecting her fourth child – her first with new partner Michael O'Neill – said she'd let Jamie find out at the same time as everyone else as she opened up to OK! magazine. 
Danielle said she'd felt "disrespected" by Jamie during his time in the Celebrity Big Brother house and added that he has nothing to do with her life any more. 
Revealing that her new relationship is "worlds apart" from her last one, Danielle said: "Michael can't do enough for me and is a brilliant role model and father figure." Danielle Lloyd and her fiance Michael Michael and Danielle with her three sons - the pair got engaged last Valentine's Day (Photo: Getty) 
She said that she and Michael were "over the moon" to be facing parenthood together and revealed they'd been trying for a few months to fall pregnant - and it took her filming Channel 5's In Therapy for her to realise that's what she wanted. 
"We both wanted a baby so much but Michael probably would have had one sooner," she said. 
"Then after I filmed the In Therapy show I realised what's important in life, so I decided to stop being selfish and go for it, and I'm so happy I did." 
The former WAG is expected to deliver in the summer - but it means her plans to marry fiance Michael are now on hold, as she doesn't want to be a pregnant bride. Read More Danielle has already picked out her wedding gown on Say Yes To The Dress (Photo: Half Yard Productions) It was a toss-up between two dresses - but Danielle finally picked one (Photo: Half Yard Productions) 
"Maybe [we'll do it] in 2018, and we'll definitely go abroad to get married - something small and intimate." 
It comes as proud mum Danielle shared a video with her Instagram followers showing her eldest boy cycling through the house, and revealed it was Michael who taught him. 
"In shock this morning didn't even know Michael had taught George to ride his bike," she wrote. "Proud mummy." 
Many fans were quick to praise her son on the achievement, and applaud the sweet boy for how well he's doing. 
"How lovely, no stopping him now, move everything in sight," joked one commenter, while another appeared to hint that Michael was stepping on toes by teaching his stepson the skill with Jamie missing out. Danielle is due to give birth this summer (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
However, others took the opportunity to criticise Jamie, who saw his three sons for the first time since CBB ended on Saturday - nearly two weeks after his eviction. 
"Dads been to busy embarrassing himself in CBB ," claimed one follower. Read More Jamie O'Hara FINALLY sees his sons nearly two weeks after leaving CBB house 
Another ranted: "Micheal is being a caring step dad to those boys . Is life not about making children happy?" 
A different fan added: "It's hard when moms and dads are separated who's going to be there when they cut their first tooth,take their first steps but look how lucky the boys will be to have a Dad and Stepdad to take them out on their bikes I wish then all a great future full of happiness especially with those three handsome boys to make them smile each day (sic)."
